Name: Chaos
About the game: Chaos is an online FPS game. Why should you play it? Destruction, lots of it, plus some explosions, oh yeah, guns! Who doesn't like guns and explosions? that's what Chaos is all about... Official Discord: The main features of Chaos are: Fight AI In The New Arena Mode! Sliding Wall Jumping Ground Slam Dynamic Crosshair System (Almost) Fully Destructible Environments Grenade to Blow Holes In Walls, And To Push The Player Fast-Paced Gameplay Lots Of Weapons M4A1 AKM SMLE MKIII MP5 Semi-Auto Shotgun Sniper Rocket Launcher Kriss Vector Hush Puppy M249 Katana Grenade Launcher More To Come... Lots Of Modes Free For All Team Deathmatch Free For All Permadeath (200% HP) Lots Of Maps With Unique Twists Space Lava Floating Missiles Accurate Linetrace Based Gunplay Built From Trusted Feedback
